dl.dd: This may be set to a tag name. If set, the conditions will only match if the template builder is parsing content for an element directly inside this tag. For example, by using a value of treechildren, the condition will only match when placing elements directly inside a treechildren tag. Thus, nested elements will not match because they are directly inside a template.XULElem("treeitem"). This attribute is useful to provide different rules for outer and inner elements.
